references.paper_title: 3d gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduced 3D Gaussian Splatting (3DGS) which is a flexible and effective 3D generation model widely used in 4D reconstruction, and is used as the baseline in this paper.

references.paper_title: Adam: A method for stochastic optimization
references.reason: This paper introduces the Adam optimizer, a widely used optimization algorithm that the authors used to optimize their 4D model.

references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduced Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF), which is a seminal work in novel view synthesis and 3D scene representation and provided the basis for many subsequent 4D reconstruction methods.

references.paper_title: Image quality assessment: From error visibility to structural similarity
references.reason: This paper introduces the Structural Similarity Index (SSIM), a widely used metric for evaluating image quality, and is used by the authors to evaluate the performance of their 4D generation methods.

references.paper_title: The unreasonable effectiveness of deep features as a perceptual metric
references.reason: This paper introduces the Learned Perceptual Image Patch Similarity (LPIPS), a perceptual metric that the authors employed to evaluate the performance of their 4D generation methods.
